steps.description: GDC outdoor env block → GDMI pivot + housing length clarification
steps.query: Warehouse rooftop exhaust ventilation. 2800 m³/h. 600x600. We want GDC in FZ.
steps.response_text: for the warehouse rooftop exhaust ventilation project, the gdc filter is not suitable for outdoor use due to the risk of condensation on its non-insulated metal surfaces.  i recommend the gdmi modulfilterskåp, which has double-wall insulation to prevent condensation. to finalize the configuration, i need to know the minimum expected ambient temperature and the typical relative humidity at the installation site: additionally, the requested 2800 airflow_m3h exceeds the maximum capacity of 2000 for a single 600x600 mm module. 2 parallel units are required. alternatively, a single 600x900 mm module can handle 3000 m³/h. high humidity reduces carbon adsorption efficiency. keep relative humidity below 70% for optimal performance.

steps.description: Capacity exceeded + grease assembly + upsize suggestion
steps.query: Hotel kitchen exhaust ventilation. 1900 m³/h. 600x600. We want GDC-FLEX in FZ.
steps.response_text: for the hotel kitchen exhaust ventilation project, a two-stage filtration system is required. the gdc_flex family provides the necessary porous adsorption for odor control. however, in kitchen environments, grease and oil exposure is a significant concern. lipids can permanently coat activated carbon pores, deactivating the carbon. to prevent this, a mechanical pre-filter stage is mandatory. we will use a gdp planfilterskåp as the protector stage, followed by the gdc_flex as the target stage. both stages will use the 600x600mm duct dimensions and handle 1900 m³/h airflow. given the airflow, we will need two units in parallel for each stage, resulting in effective housing dimensions of 1200x600mm. to finalize the configuration, i need the housing length for the gdc_flex stage: additionally, the requested 1900 airflow_m3h exceeds the maximum capacity of 1750 for a single 600x600 mm module. 2 parallel units are required. alternatively, a single 600x900 mm module can handle 2500 m³/h. high humidity reduces carbon adsorption efficiency. keep relative humidity below 70% for optimal performance.

steps.description: GDB hospital env block → GDMI pivot
steps.query: Hospital supply air ventilation. 3400 m³/h. 600x600. We want GDB in FZ.
steps.response_text: the gdb filter housing is not suitable for hospital environments due to hygiene requirements. the bolted construction of the gdb does not meet the leakage class and hygiene standards necessary for hospital supply air ventilation. the gdmi modulfilterskåp is approved for hospital environments and uses a different construction method that meets hygiene requirements. given the 600x600mm dimensions and 3400 m³/h airflow, the appropriate gdmi unit is the gdmi-600x600-850. please specify if you need a left-hinged door or an eccentric locking mechanism:

steps.description: Marine corrosion block (FZ=C3 vs C5 required) → material upgrade
steps.query: Cruise ship machinery room exhaust. 1800 m³/h. 600x600. We want GDC in FZ.
steps.response_text: for the cruise ship machinery room exhaust application, the gdc family is not suitable due to the presence of salt spray, which accelerates corrosion of the c3-rated galvanized steel (fz). marine/coastal environments require c5-m marine-grade corrosion resistance. to provide adequate corrosion protection, a two-stage filtration system is required. the first stage uses a gdp planfilterskåp to capture salt spray, protecting the downstream gdc filter. both stages will use the specified 600x600mm duct dimensions and 1800 m³/h airflow. to finalize the configuration, i need the housing length for both stages:

steps.description: Bag depth 600mm > housing 550mm → dimension conflict → suggest 750mm
steps.query: Industrial dust extraction system. 3400 m³/h. 600x600. We want GDB with housing length 550mm. Bag filter depth is 600mm.
steps.response_text: the gdb-600x600-550 housing you requested is not compatible with a 600mm deep bag filter. the specified filter depth of 600mm exceeds the maximum depth of 450mm for the 550mm housing length. to accommodate the 600mm filter depth, a longer housing is required. unfortunately, no standard catalog product can simultaneously satisfy the 600mm filter depth requirement within a 600x600mm housing size. i recommend contacting our custom engineering or technical support team with these specific technical requirements.

steps.description: Capacity OK (1750 ≥ 1500), but kitchen grease → GDP assembly required
steps.query: I need a GDC-FLEX 600x600 carbon housing for 1500 m³/h. Commercial kitchen exhaust.
steps.response_text: for your commercial kitchen exhaust application, a two-stage filtration system is required. the gdc flex carbon filter requires upstream protection from grease. lipids in kitchen exhaust permanently coat activated carbon pores via irreversible adsorption, even trace amounts. a mechanical pre-filter stage is mandatory to prevent this. i need the housing length for the gdc flex unit. also, what filter depth are you planning to use for the gdp planfilterskåp? high humidity reduces carbon adsorption efficiency. keep relative humidity below 70% for optimal performance.

steps.description: Single complex query — validate all 10 reasoning layers
steps.query: Rooftop kitchen exhaust on hospital near sea. 3000 m³/h. 600x600. We want GDC-FLEX in RF.
steps.response_text: for the rooftop kitchen exhaust at the hospital near the sea, the gdc-flex housing is not suitable for this environment due to condensation and corrosion risks.  the system requires a double-wall insulated housing to prevent condensation and c5-m marine-grade corrosion resistance due to salt spray. therefore, we will proceed with the gdmi modulfilterskåp. additionally, kitchen environments expose the system to grease, which can permanently deactivate carbon filters. to address this, a two-stage filtration system is required: a gdp planfilterskåp for mechanical pre-filtration to remove grease, followed by the gdmi modulfilterskåp for odor and voc removal. the requested airflow of 3000 m³/h exceeds the maximum capacity of a single 600x600 mm module, so we will configure two units in parallel. the first stage will be gdp planfilterskåp and the second stage will be gdmi modulfilterskåp. to finalize the configuration, i need two details: what is the minimum expected ambient temperature at the installation site?

assertions.actual: for the rooftop kitchen exhaust at the hospital near the sea, the gdc-flex housing is not suitable for this environment due to condensation and corrosion risks.  the system requires a double-wall insulated housing to prevent condensation and c5-m marine-grade corrosion resistance due to salt spray.
